headline: How AI will drive profit growth for credit cards, retailers in 2026
summary: Bernstein Private Wealth Management senior investment strategist Roosevelt Bowman is taking a look ahead to how companies — specifically credit card operators and retailers — are planning to best deploy AI in 2026. Also catch Roosevelt Bowman explain how many times he expects the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates in 2026. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.

content.title: How AI will drive profit growth for credit cards, retailers in 2026
content.description:
Bernstein Private Wealth Management senior investment strategist Roosevelt Bowman is taking a look ahead to how companies — specifically credit card operators and retailers — are planning to best deploy AI in 2026.

Also catch Roosevelt Bowman explain how many times he expects the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates in 2026.

To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
